name: Hexui DarkMode Revised
description:
A reivision of Complex229's Hexui Darkmode style.

Changes:
-Lots of minor changes to make the site more 'completely' dark mdoe
-A complete revision of hexui icons to make them fit the darkmode style without weird noise
-Lots of text is much more easily read
-Lots of non dark mode areas of the site are now dark mode
